thread.section_title: ezCater Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezCater | www.ezcater.com | 6 of 121
thread.title: Steph

author: Steph
title: Steph
text: This catering service is super efficient and easy to use. I love being able to order from my IPad and easily with step by step instructions that easily take you through the ordering process. I also love that there really aren't any delivery fees associated with the website itself and all of my previous orders save automatically. I would recommend this service to anyone looking to make a good impression.
